byline.contributor: Katharine Q. Seelye contributed reporting from New York.

abstract: Cate Edwards, daughter of Elizabeth and John Edwards, is grateful that her wedding in North Carolina to Dr Trevor Upham will reflect her late mother’s touches; Elizabeth had long dreamed of her daughter's wedding one day, even helping her plan it before she died.
snippet: The 29-year-old daughter of Elizabeth and John Edwards is grateful that her wedding to Dr. Trevor Upham on Saturday in North Carolina will reflect her late mother’s touches.
lead_paragraph: The 29-year-old daughter of Elizabeth and John Edwards is grateful that her wedding to Dr. Trevor Upham on Saturday in North Carolina will reflect her late mother’s touches.

headline.main: For Cate Edwards, After Loss and Turmoil, a Day for ‘I Do’
headline.print_headline: For Cate Edwards, After Loss and Turmoil, a Day for ‘I Do’
